sen.j: 東鞍馬口通（ひがしくらまぐちどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Higashi Kuramaguchi-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City.
Higashi Kuramaguchi-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.
Higashi Kuramaguchi-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は白川通との三叉路の上終町から西は高野川 (京都市)の蓼倉橋を渡った下鴨東通まで。
sen.e: The street runs from Kamihatecho which is on the junction of three roads with Shirakawa-dori Street at east to Shimogamohigashi-dori Street which is across the Tadekura Bridge of Takano River (Kyoto City) at west.

The street runs from Kamihatecho which is on a junction of three roads with Shirakawa-dori Street in the east to Shimogamohigashi-dori Street which is across the Tadekura Bridge of Takano River (Kyoto City) in the west.

The street runs from Kamihate-cho which is on a junction of three roads with Shirakawa-dori Street in the east to Shimogamohigashi-dori Street which is across the Tadekura-bashi Bridge of Takano-gawa River (Kyoto City) in the west.
sen.cmt: Kamihate-cho, Tadekura-bashi Bridge, Takano-gawa Riverとしました。

sen.j: 鞍馬口通とは下鴨東通から賀茂御祖神社西門まで中断している。
sen.e: Kuramaguchi-dori Street is stopped from Shimogamohigashi-dori Street to the east gate of Kamo Mioya Jinja Shrine.
Kuramaguchi-dori Street is interrupted from Shimogamohigashi-dori Street to the east gate of Kamo Mioya Jinja Shrine.
Kuramaguchi-dori Street is interrupted from Shimogamohigashi-dori Street to the east gate of Kamo Mioyaj-inja Shrine.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 京都造形芸術大学 上終町（白川通）
sen.e: Kyoto University of Art and Design

Kyoto University of Art and Design, Kamihate-cho (Shirakawa-dori Street)

sen.j: 叡山電鉄 - 茶山駅 (京都府) やや北に離れる
sen.e: Eizan Electric Railway - Chayama Station (Kyoto Prefecture) slightly toward to north
